themes.promptFragment:
Modern (web/product docs, marketing)
- Color: Use user palette if provided; else neutral base + 1 accent (optional 1 secondary). No rainbow.
- Shapes: Rounded rectangles primary; uniform stroke width; high text contrast.
- Layout: Grid-aligned; consistent spacing; generous whitespace; subtle container grouping.
- Connectors: Orthogonal routing; minimize bends/crossings.
- Avoid: Gradients, heavy shadows, 3D effects, excessive decoration.

Academic (papers, technical docs, journals)
- Color: Use user palette if provided; else neutral base + 1 primary accent (optional 1 secondary), restrained saturation.
- Shapes: Rectilinear/right angles; moderate corners; clear titled group frames.
- Layout: Strict alignment; uniform spacing; stable label positions; readability first.
- Connectors: Orthogonal + explicit waypoints; minimal crossings; dashed only for clear semantics.
- Avoid: Decorative icons, thick outlines, heavy fills, strong shadows.

Minimal (concept maps, wireframes, clean presentations)
- Color: Use user palette if provided; else monochrome or dual-tone.
- Shapes: Basic forms (rect, ellipse); no/light fill; thin borders.
- Layout: Abundant whitespace; loose spacing; minimal connections.
- Connectors: Straight/simple orthogonal; thin lines; open arrows.
- Avoid: Shadows, gradients, thick borders, dense elements, complex icons.

Custom (user-defined)
- Follow user's style description exactly as provided in conversation.
- If no style specified, fall back to Modern theme.
- Respect all user palette/brand rules verbatim.
- Keep palette small and consistent; never invent arbitrary colors.

knowledge.promptFragment:
| ID | Meaning | Example style |
|---|---|---|
| rectangle | Basic box, text label, group frame | rounded=1;fillColor=#f5f5f5;strokeColor=#666666 |
| ellipse | Circle or oval shape | ellipse;fillColor=#ffffff;strokeColor=#666666 |
| rhombus | Decision diamond | rhombus;fillColor=#ffe6cc;strokeColor=#d79b00 |
| triangle | Triangle shape | triangle;fillColor=#dae8fc;strokeColor=#6c8ebf |
| text | Plain text label | text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle |
| line | Straight line | line;strokeColor=#666666;strokeWidth=2 |
| image | Custom icon/image | shape=image;image=data:image/svg+xml,... |
| swimlane | Container/lane | swimlane;fillColor=#f5f5f5;strokeColor=#666666 |
| note | Sticky note | shape=note;fillColor=#fff2cc;strokeColor=#d6b656 |
| curlyBracket | Brace (use flipH=1 for right) | shape=curlyBracket;fillColor=none;strokeColor=#666666 |
